CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1953, pg. 5, reads: "Loendi Salute to Eckstine Huge Success at Famous Door - Big Night For Mr. B - When Billy Eckstine came home during Christmas Week for an engagement at the Stanley Theatre, the Loendi Club sponsored a highly successful homecoming week for the famous crooning Pittsburgher. The week of affairs was climaxed by a huge celebration at the Famous Door on Dec. 30.  Many notables were on hand and Mr. B. received numerous gifts  in token of esteem.  Left to right: Sugar Ray Robinson was a surprise guest and he and Eckstine drew a big hand with their antics..."
TitMainTitle: Billy Eckstine and boxer Sugar Ray Robinson at microphone on stage of Famous Door club
CatSubject_tab: Eckstine, Billy.Robinson, Sugar Ray, 1920-Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Famous Door (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Clubs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
